name: The Sewers
description:
The Sewers

Lead Developer / Programmer - trixsweatpants

Models / Art - PhillipK08

Sound Design - MattLeo

As you are having a rest in your humble abode you have the urge that something is present, something dangerous. Now you trust the urge and decide it's time to leave. You've been pushing your luck for too long down here. As you walk to exit this place you once called home your urge becomes a reality. Now your goal is to leave this area as this impending doom chases you. Will you escape or will you fall.

"Look, I'd wish you hadn't seen that. It can be a . . disagreeable place. Just make sure you check behind you when heading through. And make sure to check all around before you come out. Keep your eyes on where the walls are, don't lose them, your mind may not be the only thing choked on atmosphere. Don't lose your head, you want an open casket. Live by your light, it may be your angel. You're not going to argue, that's something I think we all can agree on, maybe except for. . ."

Controls

WASD - WALK

MOUSE - TURN

RUN - SHIFT

LIGHT - F
